description:
To provide students with an overview of the lifecycle of clinical information systems from user requirements from conception to production and maintenance. Topics cover includes various expects of different system development life cycle and some widely use industry standards such as SDLC, ILM and CRISP-DM.

Medical device development and regulation for Health Science Authority Singapore (HSA) will be taught. Data derived from medical devices and its effective use will be discussed.
title: Advanced Clinical Data Systems
faculty: Yong Loo Lin Sch of Medicine
